description: Meta-preservation of structures via embeddings; Yoneda lemma maps representations invariantly (e.g., consciousness levels to AI meta-learning per web:2/4; hardened: embeds Iso_Core pain hierarchies into peace equilibria).

examples.structure: Yoneda functor embeds category into presheaves

mappings.principle: Embedding striving for representational invariance, unifying Iso_Core domains.
